titles.title: I'm Hid In The Rock, The Rock Is Higher Than I

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I'm hid in the Rock, the Rock is higher than I.
Jehovah guides my soul; I'm hid in the Rock.
Go tell my enemies, I'm hid in the Rock.
Jehovah guides my soul; I'm hid in the Rock.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I'm part of the Rock. The Rock is all of my life.
Jehovah guides my soul; I'm part of the Rock.
Go tell my enemies, I'm part of the Rock.
Jehovah guides my soul; I'm part of the Rock.
